abilities.name: Call for Power
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Charizard . This power can't be used if Charizard  is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Malevolent Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy attached to Charizard .
